wiki.content: Omar A. Rodriguez-Lopez is credited with the guitar solo on this track. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Omar A. Rodriguez-Lopez is credited with the guitar solo on this track.

track.name: Especially in Michigan
comments: It's interesting how one can rate a song 2 stars a couple years ago (as I did for this track), and even uncheck it from rotation in one's library (which I did) to not have to hear it, only to revisit it later on and rate it higher and bring it into rotation (true). I guess new music can change past perceptions as such.
Yup, I am Lithuanian! And after hearing this song -- only more proud to be one!
@NevertheMachine yes it is I use to live there it's a great state
Try singing the chorus; I bet you can't!
Omar Rodriguez Lopez's solo is great!  [2]
This song actually has some meaning to it connected with michigan.
Can't wait for a Washington Red Hot tour date
